title: In New Zealand
fullText:
In New Zealand only, where a service pillar either â€”
(a) has a socket-outlet added; or
(b) undergoes repair, which includes replacement of any socket-outlet or its overcurrent protection;
alterations shall be such that all socket-outlets supplied from that service pillar comply with Clauses 2.4.6.4 and 2.4.6.5.
